text: Asikafiki yini isikhathi kulabo abakholwayo sokuthi izinhliziyo zabo zithobele isikhumbuzo sikaMvelinqangi kanye nalokho okwehlela phansi okuyiqiniso (okwambuliwe) futhi abangabi njengalabo ababenikezwe incwadi ngaphambilini futhi belulelwa isikhathi, manjalo zabalukhuni izinhliziyo zabo futhi iningi labo izephulamthetho
